content.detailedDescription: (6/3/13 at around 9-9:30pm) myself and 2 others saw a diamond shaped object near steelton pa. at first it looked like a planet (that was low in the sky) we noticed it was moving across the sky slowly, when it got higher in the sky it started to move at a high rate of speed in a left to right zig-zag formation. at first it was not blinking then at started blinking randomly when it was above us (red/orange/white) a few times the light went out completely and towards the end of our encounter it seemed like there were two objects (almost like one would break off or the object was in two places at one time) then we heard a loud bang sound (like a gunshot or sonic boom) then the object was gone
content.summary: Red/orange/white randomly blinking object flying in a zig-zag formation

content.detailedDescription: Watched silvery star-like craft in between cloud cover move from south to southwest for 7 minutes.Looked through scope & seen it was not a star. no blinking lights but very bright steady light.At one point the craft had clouds above it so i know it was in airplane flight range.Much bigger than an airplane at that height.My kids saw it first while playing outside.It just vanished all at once while looking at it.
content.summary: Watched silvery star-like craft hover & move very slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my rear deck at my home approximately 9 pm on june 10, 2006. i'm sorry i do not remember the exact date.  there was no one else home at the time.  my son was out for the evening.  it was very quiet and peaceful outside and i was enjoying the evening.  there were no children playing or any adults that i could hear or see. i did not have any lights on outside but there was a little light shining out from my kitchen.  i was looking up at the night sky and looked to my left which would be a northeastern direction over my neighbor's roof and i saw what i thought was a plane but there was no sound.  it appeared to be a small bright headlight, even though planes usually have two, and was steadily and slowly approaching as it was getting larger.  we have an airport located not very far away and see a lot of planes coming and going.  however, that night i did not hear or see any planes before, during or after the event. the path it was traveling in was coming directly towards me so i continued to watch it and as it got closer i realized it was not a plane and the bright headlight was really brilliant white flames.  for a moment i thought it might be a balloon slowly descending but there was no balloon. instead there appeared to be what looked like an upside down white styrofoam cup type object.  the flames were the brightest white i've ever seen.  they were at such an angle that they were dominant and almost obscured the object behind them until it got closer.  the flames were shooting out and flickering and i couldn't take my eyes off of it.  i felt a little panicky as it came closer to me and decided if it got too close i would run in the house.  it kept coming closer and i was about to run when it abruptly went to the left without turning or changing it's position.  it was still facing me but moving left.  it was moving at a quick pace and for some reason i was no longer afraid probably because it was going away from me.  i ran after it out to my front yard wall as far as i could go and watched as it continued in the same direction and getting smaller as it traveled.  it then suddenly ascended, not straight up, but at an angle in a northern direction and kept climbing until i could no longer see it.  i was wishing there was someone out and about that i could have asked if they saw what i had seen but the streets were quiet and empty.  i told my son as soon as he got home and he never doubted what i saw.  he just wished he had seen it too.  however, when i went to work the next day and told the people i ate lunch with, i was laughed at and even called a liar by one of them.  i couldn't believe their reaction.  i thought they were my friends.  so i've kept it to myself for all these years but i've always wondered if anyone else has ever seen the same thing i have.  so i decided to get in touch with you.  i've watched many episodes about ufo's but have not seen anything like it as yet.  i would love to hear from you if there are any other reports like this.  thank you for allowing me to share this with you.
content.summary: I saw a white upside down styrofoam cup type object emitting brilliant white flames silently traveling towards me one summer evening while sitting outside.

content.detailedDescription: I saw it with my girlfriend ! it was moving then disappeared !
content.summary: I saw it 2 days ! day after day ! in the same exact time !!!

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 8 years old i lived with my family on woodbridge air force base near ipswich, england. our house was the second duplex on a road to the east of the main gate.

i was awakened sometime in the middle of the night to whistles blowing and men shouting. my father and sister were also awakened, so we all went to the front door to see what was happening (my mother slept through most of it).

i saw armed gi's in their fatigues running alongside military vehicles that lined up along the road directly across from our home. the men ran down the street and into the woods about 15-20 yards to the southeast of our house.

my dad rushed outside to find out what was going on, while my sister and i remained in the doorway of our home. at first i watched my dad talking to the soldier, but then my attention went back to all the activity that was going on...  as i watched the soldiers running into the woods, my eyes lifted upward in the direction they were running. about another 50 yards further into the woods, i became transfixed by extremely bright lights filtering through the trees that were pulsating in all directions from one single location - on or near the ground.  the lights were like rays or beams, similar to movie marquee lights.  they were softly pulsating with glowing green and pinkish hues, and as bright as a football stadium - they lit up most of the forest within our view.  i recall standing in the doorway completely mesmerized. this lasted for about five minutes. 

then my dad returned with orders to gather the family and remain indoors, which is exactly what we did.  it seemed the noise continued for another hour, and eventually i went back to sleep. in the morning it was as if nothing ever happened. in the next days and weeks rumors spread around the base, schools, and my dad's workplace, that a ufo had landed.

for the past few years i have been in contact with a few of the people involved in the now infamous rendlesham forest incident that occurred just weeks before my family moved to england. none of those individuals, including nick pope - formerly with the british ministry of defense - has any knowledge of what i saw. unfortunately i cannot give an exact time of when this happened, but as far as my family and i could discern, this occurred sometime in the fall or winter of 1983.

i can attest that it was not a downed aircraft, nor was it a forest fire. and it seems very unlikely that the air force would conduct base exercises (aka "war games") so close to dependent housing in the middle of the night, unless we were under a direct threat from russia, as it was the cold war era.  and i would assume there would be some kind of documentation somewhere, or that there is someone out there who either witnessed or participated in the event - i recall at least 20 to 30 individuals involved.
content.summary: 1983 - raf woodbridge - extreme bright lights emanating out of woods **military involvement**

content.detailedDescription: So, i was watchin my dog take a crap a few days ago last niht. and when i went in to check on mah hamster gary, he was gone!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ya know, i looked every wear for him. his cage was even lowacked and his munch stick was still in there. he alwas has his munch stick. then mya dawg wanted to come in. so i went out side to let hin im. but then i saw it. a shiney light that i could see! ya know, i, i went running towards it becas i thought it was gary. but then i looked down and saw gary. he had the weirdest thing stickin out of his ass. but then i thoht...Alins? mah hamster was prboed. someone hylp my!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Looked like a ball

content.detailedDescription: Sat night 6/8/13 about 10pm cst here is break down -  bright, yellow-orange, almost like a meteor but not, they were too slow and too precise in their flight pattern, one behind the other, very precise path across the sky. i saw two groupings of 4, then followed by 2 grps of 3 (what i remember), then a couple grps of 2 or 1 object, until the very last one passed overhead.  spacing between objects about 200feet give or take 20ft.  1st grp was fairly evenly spaced as all 4 flew pass, 2nd grp alittle tighter spacing but it's 4th-last object was going faster and further back, so it was going faster to catch up in its grp, these groups and objects gave no noise to my ears (none) it was very quiet night. they all seemed no higher in night sky then what a small plane or hellicopter might do to fly over. i say there was 10 seconds give or take a second, between the 1st grp and 2nd grp, same for 3rd and 4th groups, then it was more like one object at a time, about same 10 second spacing before i would see the next one appear...Until the last object appeared, flew by into the nw sky above the house tops. all told, i say 20 or 22 of these objects things flew by over head. darnest thing i ever seen, especially no sound, none!!!  these were not metors, way too slow, i say going about speed of small engine plane or helicopter...Took about 8-10 seconds for each object to fly by, that is slow. but the lights were not headlights, no blinking, the shiny bright light encompassed the whole object, teardrop shape with front part more wider then the tail, i am curious if anyone else reported a similar sighting, or got a video of it( i wish i had ). i did try to vocus on them using binoculars, but my binocs are not strong, objects were just a blurring of bright light...
content.summary: Two groupings of 4, then 2 grps of 3, then gprs of 2 or 1 until last one passed overhead

content.detailedDescription:
I am currently on a camping trip south of prescott az. last night i went to bed soon after midnight. because there isn't any chance of rain i set up my tent without the rainfly so i could see the stars. i'm unsure of the time but i estimate sometime between 2:30 and 4 a.M. i woke up having to use the bathroom. lying on my back i was looking up at the stars when i noticed a brighter than usual star directly above me. i have no idea how high it was because it only appeared to be a star. it was a very bright white, almost with a blue tint to it. i don't know the location of constellations other than a fewmajor ones and the north star so it didn't occur to me that it could be anything other than a star. then it started moving maybe two or three minutes after i initially noticed it. it was faster than any plane i have ever seen up here, and that comparison includes 2 fighter jets i saw last year, (f-16's i think). i would say it was going a little faster than the jets did. it moved in a nne direction, in a straight line initially, then after it had crossed about 1/3 of the horizon it began to zig left and right in about 1 second durations, doing the same angle of change each time and continuing nne overall. each turn might have been 5 degrees or so. it only took about 20 seconds for it to go beyond the horizon i could see. i was more alert and scanned the sky for a little while and saw another light maybe 5 minutes later i noticed another stationary light is similar brightness wnw of me. i watched it for a few minutes and then it started moving at about the same speed to the right across the horizon from my perspective. i was only able to see it for a few seconds before its path took it behind a mountain that blocked any more view of it. 

there was no moon out, no clouds, no wind and no other lights like planes at that time. i didn't hear any sound at all i would associate with aircraft, just very silent. i intend to be up here camping for a few more days so i would be happy to show an investigator where i am or provide gps coordinates.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two silent, bright white lights that hovered and then moved away rapidly in irregular flight path

content.detailedDescription:
I am a medium and was working at my home on a warm day.  i was in the front corner bedroom which was my office. this bedroom has seen quite a bit of activity with many spirits and at one time had a portal to the other side that allowed spirits to come and go. at the time i was working on my computer and setting up a camera and took some video of the monitor. i was alone in the house and it was quiet. after i went back to review what i had captured, i noticed what looked like a being of some sort standing about 3 feet tall behind me. in the video, you can see its head moving slightly looking up at me. 

there was nothing in the room that would of made that shape or be mistaken as something else. i was shocked because i didnt see or feel anything at the time.  i uploaded the video to the internet and shortly after my computer mysteriously crashed and was destroyed.

i have not seen anything since.  i added a photo captured from the video...It still freaks me out to this day.
content.summary: Captured video of entity on video

content.detailedDescription:
On may 18, 2013, saturday, my sister and i were visiting san francisco for a museum exhibit.  we had just finished dinner downstairs at the hotel and returned to the room at 7:00 pm.  we were looking at the view from the room (24th floor facing north).  looking out over the bay, i spotted a small white cloud in a weird shape.  i mentioned to my sister my previous ufo sighting on december 14th, 2012.  she dismissed it.

i started taking photos. a few minutes later, some lights dropped down from the cloud and headed north.  i missed this photo opportunity because i was doubting myself.  but later i started taking photos again because the lights were coming on down below on the street.  

i found the lights in formation when i enlarged the photos on my digital camera.  also a military plane can be seen in the upper left top corner of one of the photos.

everything was headed north and east out of the picture.
content.summary: My sister and i observed a white cloud in a cloudless sky in an odd shape.  then a couple of lights dropped down and went north.

content.detailedDescription: The following is an interview with my mother,nancy gandolfo,relating to our whole family's (4 people in total)close up encounter with a ufo at approximately 7 pm back in february of 1969 in northwestern,east canaan connecticut at our home in litchfield county. my recollection of the event is as follows.We (my mother,father sister and myself)were heading north up our driveway in our car in east canaan connecticut at about 7 pm on february 7th 1969 we got about halfway up our drive when a bright multi colored  object about 60 feet in diameter appeared in front of us at about 500 yards in front of our car we were facing in a north direction still, it hovered at about 500 feet above ground for about 45 seconds above a tree line that was across  route 44 at the top of our driveway,the craft made a humming type of sound,then the craft elevated in a bright green flash and disappeared in a north westerly direction,the night was very crisp,clear and very very cold and after the craft disappeared we agreed not to say anything about this event.The craft itself was greyish silver in appearance and resembled a child's antique spinning top,it was about 60 feet wide and about 20-40 feet tall,it had circular pulsating lights in the middle of the craft of colors blue,green,yellow,red and white,there were also small portal type windows above the circulating lights,the lights seemed to rotate in a clockwise motion then reverse direction to a counter clockwise motion that same year in september about 4 miles away in ashley falls massachusetts in berkshire county one of the world's most scrutinized and studied ufo abduction cases to date took place as well. up until 1 week ago 6-2-13 after seeing a new ufo show on the science chanel about that abduction case in ashley falls mass, i had no idea this event and several others like it involving the same individuals as the first ashley falls mass. sighting in that area even occurred,i thought i and my family were the only ones who saw any type of ufo and that there was no other ufo activity in that surrounding area at very close range,we saw this craft at less than 500 yards away at about 500 feet above ground hovering for almost 1 minute .Our family agreed never to speak about this event minutes after it happened and for all intents and purposes none of us ever did until now.I have been seeking answers as to why 1 week after our sighting i had a recurring 3 year nightmare/dream..I post this interview so that you all may listen to this and possibly if you yourself had an event you might come forward and speak of it with someone or share it..I will be seeking council with a world renowned ufo abduction hypnotist and i myself will be hypnotized and hope to find out why my dreams happened over and over and what happened after the nightmare and dream state paralysis ended and my memory faded each time..I also taped this interview as this is the first time in over 40 years i have actually talked with my mother about our sighting and wanted to confer with her and possibly gain some new insight or possibly remember parts of the event that were forgotten in my memory,as i was only 5 years old at the time, that by talking with her would be remembered as was certainly the case..This event happened it was real and it completely changed/ altered my mind and it is my hope that with all i have been through with relation to this event as recently as 2011,to gain some sense of why !!!
content.summary: 1969 all 4 of us in our car a ufo less than 500 yards away at about 500 feet above ground hovering 45 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my deck facing se when i noticed the beautiful night shy  but a little cloudy  around midnight ,i noticed a plan traveling east bound around 3-5 miles up it seemed nothing special. then i glanced straight up when a flashing light caught my eye traveling in a west direction about 5 miles up ,and each time it flashed in moved at quicker than a normal plane speed  ,it was almost invisible only the flashing light seemed round in shape.
then it started zigzagging and flashing ,each time it flashed it moved at extreme speeds ,every flash changed directions from west to east to north to south as if avoiding or making a sign pattern ,all this happened within a less than 1 to 2 minutes total time span. then it  flashed for the last time  and it disappeared what it  seemed like a west direction ,then about less than 15 seconds travelling from the west to east direction ,i saw a american winged war plane traveling east direction about 5 miles high and it flew east .That was it. i know there is no known man made plane that can change directions that quick and seemed like it had stealth material only light flashing .
content.summary: A flashing light moving in a sw to w directions changing various directions abruptly very high speedas if avoiding or being followed then about 15 seconds a winged american fighter plan flew over but light long gone

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Estaba en mi cuarto, por cierto la casa de es de 1 piso, estaba en mi cuarto arriba , estaba en la computadora y atras de la computadora tengo una ventana grande, aparecieron 3 luces y me llamo la atencion cuando me asome vi un triangulo negro con una luz en cada esquina y una en el medio parpadeando. entre en un momento de shock y me quede mirando sorprendido. tarde en sacar mi celular pero logre sacar 3 fotos del ovni alejandose. lo perdi de vista cuando se fue en direccion de unos arboles. ahi ya no lo pude ver, lo pude ver claramente y perfecto.
content.summary: Triangulo negro con luz en cada esquina y una en el medio a baja altura

content.detailedDescription: There were 5 of us sitting around a campfire when another camper walked by and stated that he was watching the strangest lights in the sky. we all looked up and saw what appeared to be a glowing red fireball floating accross the sky heading in our direction to pass above us. it was moving slowly and not making a sound.... it moved over us and disappeared over the tree tops... then came another and then 2 more after following the same path. they left a slight trail behind them and one appeared to zigzag and then come back into the straight line path. they were spotted by another camper down the hill also. these were not planes, not helicopters, not meteorites, not ball lightning, not flares, not chinese lanterns and not swamp gas... they were deliberate moving glowing objects that flew directly over our heads. the whole thing lasted about 5 minutes and we were so stunned that no one thought to snap a picture or video. these things were so stealth that had the other camper not made us aware we would not have seen them. i believe he stated there were 12 in all that he observed.
content.summary: Fireballs in the sky moving intentionally and slowly leaving trail.

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was just home from work

2) first thing i noticed was how crazy bright it was. it wasn't just about how bright, but how different the brightness looked. it wasn't like a flare in the sky, it was this weird bright object that was really close.

3) my first thoughts were it was a ufo. well maybe not a ufo ufo, but an object that didn't make sense. nothing i've seen before.

4) it just went from n of my house to sw of my house. all 4 to 5 of them went from the same direction to the other end. 

6) lights got dimmer and dimmer and i think it's because it was going farther and farther away from me.

i have photos and a 5 min video
content.summary: Really bright light that i've never seen before. they were really different. i caught around 4-5 going in the same dirrection.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just arrived home after stopping at the store.  my eyes were immediately drawn upward to a bright yellow light.  it was in the same direction that most small planes travel from, but it was a different color, much brighter and about 10 times larger than the small plane lights and much much higher. (large planes come from another direction) it was northwest of my location, about 3-5 miles above the earth. for about 2 minutes, i watched this bright yellow light (slightly increasing in intensity) in a stationary position.  it started to slowly move southwest for about 1 minute.  as it remained in this path, the yellow began to fade.  it then turned to orange and changed (slight curve) to a northeast direction.  it changed again to red and finally black.  for about a minute, i watched a black oval slowly traveling east northeast and then it disappeared completely.  just vanished.  it could have been due to the marine layer.
i did not really think it was a plane due to the size and color.  i had suspicions that it could have been a comet, but it had no tail. the change of direction made me question this as well.  i logged onto the internet to see if there were any comets passing the earth, but one was only 53ft long and the other was millions of miles away.  recalling the halebop comet, they looked nothing alike.  halebop was stationary while i watched it.  it was fuzzy and had a tale.  this appeared brighter, clearer and closer.  that night was the first time in my 44 years that i actually thought i could have seen a "ufo"
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large bright yellow light.  first fading then changing to orange/red/black

content.detailedDescription: Una luz al sur de la ciudad color naranja rojo tama���o de una estrella , sube y en dos ocasiones emite una lluvia de luces blanco azuladas que descienden rapidamente y desaparecen , el objeto luminoso sube unos 1000 o 1500 mts y al cabo de unos 10 a 15 minutos se desplaza lentamente de oriente hasta desaparecer en occidente manteniendo su color inicial, lo observamos tres personas a las 12 y 40  hasta las 12 y 55 minutos aproximadamente desde el barrio prado centro en el centro de la ciudad. hace 6 meses un evento similar ocurrio el 30 de noviembre del a���o 2012 y esa vez el comportamiento fue muy similar al descrito hoy sube una luz amllo rojo suelta dos lluvias de luces blanco azules y luego la bemgala  solo que se desprendio una luz como una bengala que se dirigio de occidente a oriente a la misma altura y el evento hasta que la luz amarillo rojiza desaparecio fue de una media hora aproximadamente.
content.summary: Una luz ambar que despide una lluvia de luces azuladas mientras asciende

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was going home which was right around the corner. 		      	                                                                    
2.When i look up  and notice lights  flashingk
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cone,   Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Triangle
content.summary: The description is that it had like more of a boomerang circler shape to it with three landing gears at the bottom with different color light around it moving in a circle rotation hovering over trees with no noise

content.detailedDescription: Saw a flash that was almost the same as a camera from the sky at our house in acampo california and abruptly after that dogs began to bark wildly from all around my girl friend and i had just arived home after dineer and we were both looking opposite directions and we both thought it came from where we were facing...
content.summary: Flash from sky animals reacting

content.detailedDescription:
Form would not allow me to select a required province for submition so i changed location to usa/washington. i have a small shop beside my house and i was puttering and watching youtube videos. i went outside for a smoke at about 11:15 pm on june 8 2013 and as i stood looking toward the southwest 1 big blueish orb seemed to appear out of nowhere. another one came out about 2 seconds later and then a 3rd one maybe 5 seconds after that. i shook my head trying to make sense of what i was seeing. they appeared to be huge semi-transparrent blueish/white bubbles with a very bright white core. as they descended, (they appeared to enter in a downward direction coming out of what faintly looked like a misty river portal), they levelled out heading north and after maybe 20 seconds they all changed into smaller star-like redish/orange balls; the larger orbs seemed to turn off leaving the small center part. at this point i was trying to get a camera working but both cameras had dead batteries. i tried to get footage with my cell camera but i do not know yet if i got any footage, i am not hopefull with the cell. i watched as 1 zig-zaged in every direction effortlessly. i then called a neighbour to try get someone else to see this. by the time the neighbour looked the objects had moved away behing thick trees to the northwest.
thats it in a nutshell i guess. this was awesome!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 huge glowing orbs seemed to come through portal 1 after another changing to small redish yellow and moving zig/zag independantly.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:35 pm when i noticed a white light in the sky to the south. it behaved just like a satellite, except it made a slow turn that i cannot possibly believe a satellite could make given that much distance. about 5 minutes after noticing the light in the sky, it was toward the east-north-east, and i stopped watching it after it got to about 15 degrees above the horizon east-north-east of me.
content.summary: White light ufo that changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
Manejando hacia licant���n, a las 21:42, muy oscuro, pasa muy r���pido de sur a norte este par de luces, a velocidad de meteorito, pero sin desmembrarse en absoluto, luces como del signo de electricidad volterado, con otra m���s peque���a del lado trasero. me detuve poco m���s adelante para escuchar si dej��� ruido en el aire, pero no escuch��� nada.
la impresionante velocidad atestiguada me insitan a dejar mi primer testimonio en este sitio.

driving to licant���n, at 21:42, very dark, flies very quickly  from south to north this pair of lights, meteor speed, but without breaking up at all, it looked like flipped electric sign with a smaller light at the rear attached.  i stopped to listen for noise allowed in the air, but i heard nothing.
the impressive speed attested is enough me to leave my first testimony on this site.
content.summary: Very fast double light, one with bolt like shape

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dog- he likes to chase coyotes unless retrained. we live in the country and it is very dark at night. i was watching for meteors when i saw what i thought was a satelite coming out of the west, moving east. it was larger than the satelites we usually can observe and was not on the same path they usually follow tho. it appeared to be exactly overhead when it made an abrupt downward turn and brightly flared. it then resumed it's original trajectory but the glow faded and i lost sight of the object. i am totally convinced that i witnessed a re-entry. i felt very elated, hoping that it was our technology.
content.summary: Thought it was large satelite until it abruptly came straight down for a second or two, then resumed original trajector but glow faded

content.detailedDescription: I was out smoking a cigarette around 8 pm and i saw a large glowing green orb slowly falling towards earth. it was lower than the moon and it dissipated before it touched the ground. it had no sound that i could hear, but it looked like it was miles away. it has a glowing tail, like a comet tail, behind it. it took about 6 seconds for it to fall and dissapate.
content.summary: Large glowing green orb slowly fell towards earth. it left a green trail behind it.

content.detailedDescription: I was home alone with my twins and i decided to set up camera to take some pictures of star trails. the twins were watching their movie so i went out back and set up camera. i know i didnt get in focus and had high iso on it but(found this out later) but one of the twins wanted to come out so i set my timer anyways for 5 sec photos(400 photos total). when i was scrolling through them on camera i noticed this picture. i really do not know if this is a camera fluke or is something unidentified. i live next to an airport but i know what a airplane looks like in my photos. i have taken many star trail photos. the picture before has nothing and the picture after has nothing. i hope someone can give me some answers. i am attaching all 3 photos. will send more of the 400 if need be. img 4607 is the one in question. 4606 and 4608 are the before and after. it has 2 green orbs in the sky. from the picture it looks as if one is completely stationary because there is no trail on in since its a 5 second video. hope for some insight. thank you very much.
content.summary: Photo taken with auto timer

content.detailedDescription: Submitted another photo but didn't notice this one in the same group of photos.  taking pictures of a bird and noticed first orb like glow but while going through the rest of the photos i noticed something different color and shape than what i had seen.  am now submitting both photos together and zoomed in so you can decide what they are.
content.summary: Taking picture of what i thought was an eagle

content.detailedDescription: We were at epcot center waiting for the fireworks, as i look to the distant sky i saw what appears to be an aircraft with the normal contrail following it, but soon the contrail stop and the object continue moving our way, as i was telling my sister and the rest of the family that normally contrail don't just stop from an aircraft unless it's low to the ground, about this time three lights were released from the bright light, i snapped a couple of pictures, also it appears that another set of triangular lights were released, as i tried to get another picture the object disappeared as if someone turn off the light. we felt that maybe this was part of the show but the light was so far out of the area that i don't believe disney had anything to do with it.
content.summary: Bright light release three lights in triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: In the beginning, i saw an object like a falling star. i thought and believed that it was not a falling star but an ufo.  by it being late and where it believed it landed.  nightly, as i walked my dog, i observed every date where it could have landed.  on a particular night, as i was walking the dog, i looked up and saw the flying saucer rising over the trees in the direction where i believed it had landed.  as then flying saucer came over the trees, it was so close to me that i could touch it.  there was a bubble on the flying saucer and we were able to look at one another, face to face for at least two minutes until they gradually vanished i  the air.  as time passed, i would return to the place where then ship landed.  i would call out to the ufo and they amazingly responded as star lights bounding off the trees.  you have to be very careful because they have resources where they can seriously do bodily harm
content.summary: Round with bubble and little man with big head and little body  sitting on dash board

content.detailedDescription: We were at epcot center waitnig for the fire works, as i look to the distant sky i saw what appears to be an aircraft with the normal contrail following it, but soon the contrail stop and the object continue moving our way, as i was telling my sister and the rest of the family that normally contrail don't just stop from an aircraft unless it's low to the ground, about this time three lights were released from the bright light, i snapped a couple of pictures, also it appears that another set of triangular lights were released, as i tried to get another picture the object disappeared as if some one turn off the light. we felt that maybe this was part of the show but the light was so far out of the area that i don't believe disney had anything to do with it.
content.summary: Bright light releasing 3 triangle shape lights, all the light s vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was putting my son to bed and a bright light caught my eye out of his bedroom window.  both of us saw a very large pulsating red, white, and blue strobeing circular light hovering in the trees. i first tried to take cell phone pictures but they only caught small looking light dots. not at all what i was seeing. so i got my canon power shot g3 camera out of the closet and the battery was dead because i had not used it for awhile. i grabbed the charger cord and plugged in and shot photos and video out of my sons window for more than one hour. the shape i was seeing was not changing, but the still photos show color changes and shapeshifting. most of the frames i shot were just dark with no visible image, and many others were pictures of different color orbs, mostly blue. i had to suppress my flash because it ruined the pictures. so all of the photos are of the lights without any other light. i did not know what i was catching i just kept shooting. i also tried some video with my canon camera but it only caught a moving small dot light similar to what i've seen on the internet. but the still photos were amazing, they caught shapes, colors and clear images. one clearly looks like an adult and a child made of lights.  i stopped taking photos before it left and went to bed convinced that i must be seeing things! i thought i would go outside in the morning and find some pole with a light on top of it that i had not noticed before. a plane warning light or a cell phone tower that was just put up, but nothing was there. just trees. i also did not know what i was catching as i had to use my viewfinder feature on my camera to enlarge the images. since then i have downloaded them to my computer for further enlargement and what i captured is nothing short of amazing. i have kept the photos on my cell phone and canon camera so that i can show them to someone for authentication. right now i can't wait to have an expert look at them. i will share only one of my photos here but will show all of them to someone for authentication. i'm attaching an  orb photo as that seems to be the more common one. i will hold my special photos as i feel they are not to be given away for free.
content.summary: Hovering strobing circular light that i photographed for more than one hour. shot video and still photos. light to the naked eye looked like a giant ball of strobing lights, but photos captured shapes shifting, multi colors, orbs and human forms.
